title: Still no Gift of Magic icon
body: And I gifted twice to 2 different people. I love that icon. It's so cute and I hope to get it soon ~~I also spent money to gift as well~~

replies.body:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions

>NOTE: Both unlockable Summoner Icons can only be earned between 8:00 am April 19 and 11:59 pm April 26 Pacific time. The icons will be granted **within two weeks after the promotion ends.**

> [{quoted}](name=Wolfess,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EmJ2sxti,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-03T02:54:45.618+0000)
>
> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/champion-release/xayah-and-rakan-available-now-launch-promotions

I was hoping to get a Red to look up my status
No worries, just like the event page says the icons are all going out until May 10th

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EmJ2sxti,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2017-05-08T04:29:01.198+0000)
>
> No worries, just like the event page says the icons are all going out until May 10th

Still nothing >.<

> [{quoted}](name=Empress OnyxBird,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EmJ2sxti,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-05-03T02:59:06.689+0000)
>
> I was hoping to get a Red to look up my status

if you don't receive it within two weeks after the event end date, then submit a ticket.
